REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to applications for the approval and construction of energy-related projects
Summary: Relates to applications for the approval and construction of energy-related projects of the New York Power Authority by the public authorities control board.
LawCode: Amd ยง51, add ยง1005-e, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to applications for the approval and construction of energy-related projects
